||||||||	public function getSuffixes()
	{
		return $this->getOptions()->get('suffixes', array());
	}

	/**
	 * Load the automatically generated language suffixes.
	 * Example: array('es-ES', 'es', 'ltr')
	 *
	 * @return  self
	 *
	 * @since   3.5
	 */
||||||||||||||||HAS_DOC_COMMENTNO_RETURN_TYPE
(
    (AST_RETURN
        (AST_METHOD_CALL
            (AST_METHOD_CALL
                (AST_VAR))
            (
                (SCALAR)
                (AST_ARRAY)))))
